name: Knights of Hell (OokamiDesu)
description:
Knights of Hell is a fast fps where you play as Collin the heavy hitter of a team of robber knights, plunderers of wealth. Go and kill troops of soldiers in a castle under siege. # Student project realized in 15 days in teams of 10.  Controls
  • WASD = Move
  • Mouse = To Look around 
  • E = To Execute 
  • Shift = To Dodge
  • Space = To Jump
  • F = Grenade
  • C = Charge
  • Mouse Wheel = Switch Weapon
